data.name: Delicious Solitaire
data.detailed_description:
Delicous Solitaire cleverly combines themes like palate-pleasing and kitchen dreams with a popular card game.

Unlock many solitaire levels with very appetizing looking backgrounds and enjoy different solitaire variations with a matching set of cards.

The program is suitable for beginners as well as for the experienced solitaire player and offers challenging gameplay!

- Solitaire game with many challenging levels
- Beautiful backgrounds with matching card set
- Various locations on the theme of palate pleasers
- Suitable for beginners and solitaire pros alike

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP / 7 / 8 / 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel Core Duo 2 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Onboard graphic card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard Soundcard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP / 7 / 8 / 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel Core Duo 2 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 4800 Series
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard Soundcard
